name: Hefty Ultra Strong 13 Gallon Trash Bags, Tall Kitchen Trash Bags 13 Gallon Size, Resist Leaks, Punctures, and Rips, Continuous Odor Control, White, Fabuloso Scent, 80 Bags
short_description: 13 Gallon Tall Kitchen Garbage Bags-This package contains 80 Hefty Ultra Strong 13 Gallon Kitchen Trash Bags in White, Fabuloso scent
Toughness You Can Trust-Hefty's strongest tall kitchen garbage bags deliver toughness you can trust with a secure, break-resistant drawstring and superior durability

Arm and Hammer Odor Control and Fabuloso Scent-Patented odor control, paired with the joyful scent of Fabuloso, leverages the power of Arm and Hammer to fight nasty odors and keep your kitchen smelling fresh
6-In-1 Protection-These Hefty 13 gallon trash bags offer a powerful combination of six features: flex strength, tough drawstring, patented odor control, and resistance to leaks, punctures, and rips

Arm and Hammer Odor Control and Fabuloso Scent-Patented odor control, paired with the joyful scent of Fabuloso, leverages the power of Arm and Hammer to fight nasty odors and keep your kitchen smelling fresh
product_description: Trust Hefty Ultra Strong 13 Gallon Trash Bags to keep your kitchen waste contained—all the way from the can to the curb. Thanks to 6-in-1 Protection, these tall kitchen trash bags offer flexible strength, a secure closure, odor control technology, and resistance to leaks, punctures, and rips. The result is the highest protection you can get in flexible 13 gallon trash bags. Hefty’s stretchy strength means you don't have to worry about unexpected bag breakage and inconvenient messes when you use these tall kitchen garbage bags. A break-resistant grip drawstring makes it easy to close the bag and cart it away without incident. As a bonus, these scented white trash bags include Arm and Hammer odor control technology and a Fabuloso scent to keep unpleasant smells at bay and keep your kitchen smelling fresh and clean. All Hefty trash bags are backed by a 100% satisfaction guarantee. *Fabuloso (R) and associated designs are trademarks of Colgate-Palmolive Company and are used under license. **The ARM and HAMMER trademark is owned by Church and Dwight Co., Inc., and used by Reynolds Consumer Products LLC under license.

product_description: Tall Kitchen Handle-Tie Trash Bags are designed with built in handles to help make trash collection more convenient. The strong and dependable handles allow you to lift and carry the fullest bag with ease avoiding messy trash disasters. Simply cross tie the handles together to securely close, grab the bag by the handle and remove from container. The 13 gallon size is ideal for the kitchen or throughout the house and is great for your seasonal cleaning needs like Spring Cleaning and Back to School.

short_description: FORCEFLEX TECHNOLOGY: Tall kitchen garbage bags expand around sharp edges and heavy loads, so you can pack in the trash without ripping the bag; Plus, the drawstring closure provides a comfortable grip
2 LAYERS EXTRA LEAK PROTECTION: These 13 gallon kitchen trash bags are designed with 2 layers to handle heavy loads and help prevent rips, tears and leaks

product_description: Glad ForceFlex Drawstring Tall Kitchen Scented Trash Bags With Febreze provide stretchable strength plus odor control to keep your home smelling fresh and clean. These ForceFlex garbage bags trap, lock and neutralize unwanted trash odors while steadily releasing a Gain Lavender scent with Febreze freshness. These drawstring trash bags are designed with two layers for extra leak protection. RipGuard technology prevents ForceFlex trash bags from ripping to avoid leaks. Avoid tears with the ForceFlex technology, which gives the 13 gallon tall kitchen trash bags extra flex, letting them expand around sharp edges and heavy loads. Keep your trash can cleaner with the RipGuard technology and a durable grips-the-can drawstring that prevents the bag from slipping and makes closing easy. Each bag measures 1 foot 11 15/32 inches by 2 feet 1 3/8 inches, making it just the right size for most kitchen garbage cans.

product_description: Glad tall kitchen trash bags feature 2 layers of leak protection and ForceFlex technology to resist punctures, rips and tears. name: Glad Tall Kitchen Trash Bags 13 Gallon, Unscented Garbage Bags, Quick-Tie, 68 Count
short_description: TALL TRASH BAGS: Sixty-eight (68) 13-gallon Glad Quick-Tie Tall Kitchen Trash Bags, strong and sturdy to contain and transport your big trash loads
RESISTS RIPS AND TEARS: Glad trash bags feature 3-ply strength and a unique diamond design that allows bags to stretch at the top while reliably containing bulk through the middle
BUILT-IN QUICK-TIE CLOSURE: Easily close these 13 gallon trash bags by cross-tying the built-in handles, keeping garbage securely inside to avoid messy trash disasters
13 GALLON TRASH BAGS: Each bag measures 1 foot 11 3/4 inches by 2 feet 4 inches, making it just the right size for most kitchen garbage cans
MULTIPLE USES: These tall garbage bags are also perfect for covering furniture, lining a litter box, holding dirty laundry, and storing and protecting toys, blankets, linens and clothes
product_description: Glad Quick-Tie Tall Kitchen Trash Bags are strong and sturdy to contain and transport your big trash loads. Made with 3-ply strength and a unique diamond design, these Glad trash bags stretch at the top to prevent rips and tears and reliably contain bulk through the middle. The strong and dependable built-in Quick-Tie flaps make it easy to close these 13 gallon trash bags. Just cross-tie the handles and youre doneno need for inconvenient twist ties that can be misplaced. The easy-tie flaps help keep the garbage bags securely shut to avoid messy trash disasters. You can transport even the fullest garbage bag without any worries of spillage. Each bag measures 1 foot 11 3/4 inches by 2 feet 4 inches, making it just the right size for most kitchen garbage cans. These tall trash bags are great for a variety of other uses around your home or office, like storing and protecting toys, blankets, linens and clothes. You can also use these tall kitchen garbage bags to cover furniture, line a litter box or hold dirty laundry. It's better than all good. It's all Glad.
